title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Claim a Free Declasse Drift Walton L35 for a Limited Time
content:
The Declasse Drift Walton L35 (Off-Road) is a reimagining of the classic pickup for the drift scene. It boasts an aggressive stance, street style, and a full slate of customization upgrades to match.

Claim it for free from the Southern San Andreas Super Autos website or get it from Premium Deluxe Motorsportâ€™s showroom with only a small upcharge for some select modifications. But hurry, this special edition leaves the lot on August 27, so grab it now and turn every on-ramp into a playground.
